field.name: description
field.value: Integrate with Services.Transaction as an option. Default persister of configuration crashes with corrupt data, should mapping fail.

comment.author: henry
comment.text:
Hi Henrik,
Can you please provide more details for this one?

comment.author: henrik@haf.se
comment.text:
Hi,
If you map an entity in the wrong way, the persisted configuration builder has already started writing, so the next time you restart the application, that faulty configuration will be loaded. If it's transactional, exceptions will cancel the writing of the configuration.
